CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
amount DECIMAL,
date TIMESTAMP);


CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR,
email VARCHAR);


CREATE TABLE products (product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR,
price DECIMAL);


CREATE TABLE orders (order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
product_id UUID REFERENCES products(product_id),
quantity INT,
order_date TIMESTAMP);

### STATEMENT

SELECT * FROM transactions;

CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
amount DECIMAL,
date TIMESTAMP);


CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR,
email VARCHAR);


CREATE TABLE products (product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR,
price DECIMAL);


CREATE TABLE orders (order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
product_id UUID REFERENCES products(product_id),
quantity INT,
order_date TIMESTAMP);

### STATEMENT

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.date, c.name as customer_name, p.name as product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN orders o ON t.order_id = o.order_id;
